Get Admin.Description: Gets admin. You may be teleported to an available admin pad.
Get Admin.Name: Get Admin

Permanant Admin.Description: Automatically gets admin if it is regenerated.
Permanant Admin.Name: Permanant Admin

Alert Use.Description: If an unwhitelisted user tries to get a blacklisted gear, it will be announced to everyone.
Alert Use.Name: Alert Use

Blacklist Gear.Description: Whenever an unwhitelisted player is given this gear, it is immediately removed from them.
Blacklist Gear.Name: Blacklist Gear

Blacklist Phrase.Description: Whenever the selected player says the blacklisted phrase, a selected punishment phrase is said to counter it.
Blacklist Phrase.Name: Blacklist Phrase

Select Punishment Phrase.Description: Please input a punishment phrase that will be said when the selected phrase is said by the player.
Select Punishment Phrase.Name: Select Punishment Phrase

Unblacklist Gear.Description: Unblacklists a gear, allows unwhitelisted gears to recieve this gear.
Unblacklist Gear.Name: Unblacklist Gear

Unblacklist Phrase.Description: Unwhitelists a phrase from the selected player, allowing them to say it without any repercussions.
Unblacklist Phrase.Name: Unblacklist Phrase

Say Phrase.Description: Says the phrase using Players:Chat(). Detectable.
Say Phrase.Name: Say Phrase

Start Audio Visualiser.Description: Starts the Audio Visualiser, please visit bit.ly/kahvisual for the command documentation
Start Audio Visualiser.Name: Start Audio Visualiser

Paint Area.Description: Paints the selected area with the selected colour.
Paint Area.Name: Paint Area

Rejoin.Description: Rejoins the game. May not work at times.
Rejoin.Name: Rejoin

Select Paint Area.Description: Please select an area to paint.
Select Paint Area.Name: Select Paint Area

Refresh Sounds.Description: Refreshes the sounds, grabs any new ones if they are any.
Refresh Sounds.Name: Refresh Sounds

Get Age.Description: Gets the age of the selected player.
Get Age.Name: Get Age

Give Client BTools.Description: The selected player will be given client-sided btools
Give Client BTools.Name: Give Client BTools

Give Gear.Description: Gives the selected gear to the selected player.
Give Gear.Name: Give Gear

Give Teapot Turret.Description: Gives the Teapot Turret to the selected player.
Give Teapot Turret.Name: Give Teapot Turret

Lag Player.Description: Lags the selected player with PMs that contain lots of text.
Lag Player.Name: Lag Player

Anti Blind.Description: As soon as you are blinded, the blind effect is removed.
Anti Blind.Name: Anti Blind

Anti Jail.Description: As soon as you are jailed, all jails are removed.
Anti Jail.Name: Anti Jail

Anti Kill.Description: As soon as you are killed, you are reset.
Anti Kill.Name: Anti Kill

Anti Punish.Description: As soon as you are punished, you are reset.
Anti Punish.Name: Anti Punish

/c system Alert.Description: Sends a message to everyone if someone is detected using /c system.
/c system Alert.Name: /c system Alert

Crash Server.Description: Crashes the server by equiping a gear then shrinking self.
Crash Server.Name: Crash Server

Move Baseplate.Description: Just punish yourself wait a sec then unpunish then you can move the baseplate.
Move Baseplate.Name: Move Baseplate

Respawn Explode.Description: Spams respawn and explode on everyone.
Respawn Explode.Name: Respawn Explode

Click Spawn Water.Description: CTRL + Left Mouse Button will spawn water.
Click Spawn Water.Name: Click Spawn Water

Ear Rape.Description: Every 0.1 second every sound in the game is played. Undetectable in logs.
Ear Rape.Name: Ear Rape

Play All Sounds.Description: Calls :Play() on every sound in the game. Undetectable in logs.
Play All Sounds.Name: Play All Sounds

Play Music.Description: Calls :Play() on the Music Sound. Undetectable in logs.
Play Music.Name: Play Music

Stop All Sounds.Description: Calls :Stop() on every sound in the game. Undetectable in logs.
Stop All Sounds.Name: Stop All Sounds

Stop Music.Description: Calls :Stop() on the Music Sound. Undetectable in logs.
Stop Music.Name: Stop Music

Unwhitelist Player.Description: Unwhitelists a player, they are no longer excempt from abusive commands.
Unwhitelist Player.Name: Unwhitelist Player

Whitelist Player.Description: Whitelists a player, they are excempt from abusive commands.
Whitelist Player.Name: Whitelist Player
